Episodes.Title: The End of an Era (1)
Episodes.Plot: The dysfunction Gallagher family returns, but all is not well on the Chatsworth Estate. Half of Frank's neighbours are evicted from their homes as part of Operation New Start, a multi-agency crackdown on the estate's benefits culture. Jamie and Karen become the reluctant leaders of the resistance when the evictees turn to them for help, but while things look bleak for everyone else, Jackson's future appears brighter than ever.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, violence, drug use and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Save Chatsworth (2)
Episodes.Plot: Not everyone is pleased to see Carl after he shows up on the estate as a qualified policeman. Jackson finds himself being accused of falsely claiming benefits, resulting in the loss of his job which throws his marriage into chaos. Frank is given the job of becoming a double agent, so that he can get information from Carmen about the future plans for the estate. The residents end up agreeing to a deal with Carmen to save the estate. Kelly loses her baby.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, violence, drug use and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Open to  All
Episodes.Plot: Mimi and Billy decide to have an open marriage. Patty and Lillian's funeral mourning brings them some unwanted attention. Kelly can't grieve and and ends up losing control.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, violence, drug use and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Vendetta
Episodes.Plot: Micky ends up becoming the victim of a gay bashing, leaving him mentally and physically scarred whilst enjoying a night out with the boys. Carl falls for Clem on the night out. Aidan has a new group of older friends, headed by gang leader Frasier Kane. Events end up spiraling out of control one evening on the estate and Aidan is faced with a life-changing decision. Ruby Hepburn shows up on the estate and is revealed as being Mimi's niece.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, violence, drug use and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Cop Killer
Episodes.Plot: Somebody from Jamie's past arrives on the estate, looking for a favour to be returned. D.S. Brooks, is currently suspended pending some serious charges and Jamie doesn't know if he can go through with what he wants and the safety of his family ends up being in the balance. Aidan skips school after he is haunted with nightmares about his doing nothing to stop Frasier attacking his school teacher. After Frasier turns his attention to Letitia, Aidan ends up feeling like he has no choice but to act.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, violence, drug use and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Last Man Standing
Episodes.Plot: Jackson agrees to help Shane on a robbery job at a supermarket. Gloria's brother Dominic, a whisky preist, causes mayhem on the estate. Chesney regrets making a comment about Carl's girlfriend Clem.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, violence, drug use and offensive language

Episodes.Title: All Fall Down
Episodes.Plot: Everyone is really worried about Kelly. Marty is still grieving about the loss of the baby, Kelly is punishing herself physically and mentally and is spiralling out of control. Karen ends up making a bet with Dom. Avril becomes worried after she sees her colleague Calum dispensing incorrect medication at the chemist.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, violence, drug use and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Blackout
Episodes.Plot: Times are difficult and Marty and Aidan attempt to redirect a power line to the Gallagher House so that they can use free electricity. The girls gather at the Maguire house and as the drink starts to flow, hidden truths are revealed. Jamie agrees to a lock in for the guys at the pub where Frank accepts the challenge to re-enact The Hare and the Tortoise. Chesney attempts to protect the shop but pushes himself too far in the process.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, violence, drug use and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Decision Time
Episodes.Plot: When Chesney arrives home from hospital, he finds his cousin Toof waiting there for him. After he reveals his plan to close the shop and take Chesney back to Bradford, Chesney refuses to agree to it. Chesney decides that it is time for him to strike out on his own and live life to the full.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sex scenes and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Million Dollar Maguire (1)
Episodes.Plot: Jamie and Shane come up with a plan to steal a stash of scratch cards from the Lottery rooms in Manchester. Frank ends up being recruited along with Aidan and Ruby but things don't go to plan. Letitia and her friends form a girl group. Karen is determined to prove to Mimi that she can handle the Maguire business in Jamie's absence.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Drug use, sex scenes and offensive language

Episodes.Title: Rescue Me (2)
Episodes.Plot: Jamie is scared that Karen may uncover the truth about what happened with Gloria. Ruby wants to be accepted as part of the Maguire family while Aidan is fed up with being treated like the idiot child.

Episodes.Title: The Working Man
Episodes.Plot: The Department of Work and Pensions catches up with job-dodger Frank; Shane and Jackson launch a new enterprise of bootleg booze; Avril supplies pills to Patty, who wants more than her recommended dosage.

Episodes.Title: The World of Burger
Episodes.Plot: Frank loves his new job at World of Burgers; his new boss Wesley is jealous of his influence and plans to oust him; Karen embraces alternative parenting methods to deal with Connor's destructive hobby.

Episodes.Title: The Brazilian Effect
Episodes.Plot: Much to Kelly's chagrin, Marty befriends a Brazilian housemaid and decides to liberate her from servitude.

Episodes.Title: Who's the Mummy?
Episodes.Plot: Billy discovers a used pregnancy test after Mimi, Karen and Gloria spend the night boozing; Jackson is suspicious because Avril and Calum are always together after hours.

Episodes.Title: The Truth Will Out
Episodes.Plot: After the guilt of the hit and run, Shane tries to make amends by befriending the widow of the man he killed.

Episodes.Title: Secrets and Wives
Episodes.Plot: Marty finds the nerve to propose to Kelly; she becomes confused upon finding a letter from his children; Karen in convinced that Jamie is cheating on her.

Episodes.Title: Business as Usual
Episodes.Plot: Jackson and Shane's business is booming, but when Jackson spots Shane giving away food, trouble breaks out; the residents are shocked by Patty's sudden generosity towards her neighbors.

Episodes.Title: What Are Friends For?
Episodes.Plot: Dom receives a cryptic text from an former flame; Lillian bids farewell to another happy old man at the brothel who turns out to be the local magistrate.

Episodes.Title: Great Rivalry
Episodes.Plot: Jamie must act swiftly to protect his family from gang threats; Avril continues to act as a rogue pharmacist despite Jackson's warnings; Lillian must pass the British citizenship test.

Episodes.Title: One Year On
Episodes.Plot: It's Mimi Maguire's first wedding anniversary to Billy and they plan to renew their vows; an emergency meeting is held about Patty's deteriorating health; Frank takes on the task of letting Patty know.
